name: statement
the name of the curso: the verbatim query string submitted to declare this curso

name: is_holdable
the name of the curso: true if the cursor is holdable (that is, it can be accessed after the transaction that declared the cursor has committed); false otherwis

name: is_binary
the name of the curso: true if the cursor was declared binary; false otherwis

name: is_scrollable
the name of the curso: true if the cursor is scrollable (that is, it allows rows to be retrieved in a nonsequential manner); false otherwis

name: creation_time
the name of the curso: the time at which the cursor was declare
